description.p: A Sonecast Venue is basically a content aggregator plus a social network. It brings together podcasts, photos from Flickr, videos from YouTube (and other video services), and blog posts. Think of a Venue as an instant social media mash-up tool.

It's simple. Upload your photos and videos to Flickr and YouTube and assign them tags. To have your content appear here use the tag "pmaap" and whatever others you like. Then, create a Sonecast account and beside each photo, video, or blog post, find the "discuss" icon. Click and start having conversations about your media.
